scripts.build: deno run -A build.ts && cp index.html compiled/ && cp index.css compiled/ && (cp robots.txt compiled/ || true) && sed -i 's|/index.tsx|/index.js|g' compiled/index.html && deno run -A generate-sitemap.ts && for lang in en pt jp de zh ar; do mkdir -p compiled/$lang && cp compiled/index.html compiled/$lang/; done && cp compiled/index.html compiled/404.html
